name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Watch Pro
description: Feature-rich smartwatch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and water resistance. Track your fitness goals effortlessly.

name: Laptop Stand Aluminum
description: Ergonomic aluminum laptop stand that improves posture and increases desk space. Adjustable height and angle.

name: Mechanical Keyboard RGB
description: Premium mechanical keyboard with RGB backlighting, Cherry MX switches, and programmable keys. Perfect for gaming and typing.

name: Wireless Mouse Ergonomic
description: Comfortable ergonomic wireless mouse with precision tracking and long battery life. Designed for extended use.

name: USB-C Hub 7-in-1
description: Multi-port USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, SD card reader, and power delivery. Expand your connectivity options.

name: Cotton T-Shirt Classic
description: Soft, breathable 100% cotton t-shirt. Available in multiple colors. Comfortable fit for everyday wear.

name: Denim Jeans Slim Fit
description: Classic slim-fit denim jeans with stretch fabric for comfort. Perfect for casual and semi-formal occasions.

name: Running Shoes Lightweight
description: Lightweight running shoes with cushioned sole and breathable mesh upper. Ideal for jogging and daily workouts.

name: Backpack Laptop 15.6"
description: Durable laptop backpack with padded compartment, multiple pockets, and water-resistant material. Perfect for students and professionals.

name: The Great Gatsby
description: Classic American novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald. A timeless tale of the Jazz Age and the American Dream.

name: JavaScript: The Definitive Guide
description: Comprehensive guide to JavaScript programming. Essential reading for web developers and programmers.

name: Coffee Maker Programmable
description: 12-cup programmable coffee maker with auto-shutoff and brew strength control. Start your day right.

name: Desk Lamp LED
description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Eye-friendly lighting for work and study.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Non-slip premium yoga mat with extra cushioning. Perfect for yoga, pilates, and floor exercises.

name: Dumbbell Set Adjustable
description: Adjustable dumbbell set with weight range from 5-50 lbs. Space-saving design for home gyms.

name: Water Bottle Insulated
description: Stainless steel insulated water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and leak-proof.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator.

name: Webcam HD 1080p
description: Full HD 1080p webcam with autofocus and built-in microphone. Perfect for video calls and streaming.

name: Monitor Stand Wooden
description: Elegant wooden monitor stand with storage drawer. Raises monitor to eye level and organizes your desk.

name: Tablet Stand Adjustable
description: Adjustable tablet stand with 360-degree rotation. Compatible with all tablet sizes. Perfect for reading and video calls.
